channel.title: Adding Animations?
channel.description:
hey guys! I need to know how to add animations to my server!
I need a TuT for npc's attacking a dieing, and weapon animations!! Because when i attack with a weapon, it just shows my fist attacking :(
Im using Project Czar Final as a base!! ~Johno

@tw33zy wrote:

Yes… I compiled im not a complete noob

Read full topic

Did you compile?

And sorry I’m not very familiar with Czar bases and npc animations.

Maybe

npcDeath

That might be it.

item.title: Adding Animations?
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

i did this

[code]}

public int GetWepAnim() {
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1291)
		if (FightType == 2) {
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698)
		if (FightType == 3) {
			return 451;
		}[/code]

The return is different, still attacked with hand even though i have a sword equipped, at least the sword now shows up! And how do i add npc animations for dieing and attacking?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Animations?
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####){ return ###; }

Now these are the different return types: Bows: 426 DDS: 396 Godswords: 406 C'Bows: 427 Whips: 1658 Knives: 385 Obby Maul: 2927 Dh axe, Sara Sword: 2067 Scimmy, longsword: 451 Claws, Axe: 451 Halberd: 440 Maces, Battle Axes: 1833 Spears: 2080 Hammers: 2068 Flail: 2062 Karils Bow: 2075

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Animations?
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

If you look at it, its not very difficult.

return #

Is the animation

So just add that under any

if (playerEquipment [playerWeapon] == #)

And the fightType shouldn’t be hard to figure out.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Animations?
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

Ok, i found this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == -1) if (FightType == 2) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) if (FightType == 3) { return 395; } Now what?

item.title: Adding Animations?
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

[quote="‘blakeg’’"]daniel for the swing bug did you add it into client.java under

	public int GetWepAnim() {

then put

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ITEM ID) { return 451; }
that should do it i got it to not dis-appear

and ty for releaseing finally :D[/quote]
